description:
Keep your food fresh for an extended long weekend getaway. This enormous cooler carries up to 137 cans (that's a lot of space). Thick insulated walls keep ice chilly for up to 5 days in summer temps, and a small hatch in the lid lets you access easy-to-grab items without opening the whole lid and letting the heat in.

  • EcoCool™ body and lid are made from recycled plastic yogurt cups and milk jugs
  • Cool Riser® technology reduces heat transfer by keeping contents further from warm surfaces
  • Eco-friendly ThermeCool™ foam insulation and Maxcold® technology keep contents colder, longer
  • Comfortable grip handle and oversized wheels provide all-terrain mobility
  • Long profile fits taller bottles such as 2L pop bottles or wine bottles
  • Sturdy side handles for carrying
  • 4 self-draining cup holders in the lid mean fewer kicked-over drinks
  • Integrated tie-downs secure cooler in truck beds or boat decks
  • Integrated ruler on the lid because you never know what you'll need to measure
  • Threaded drain plug is leakproof and allows a hose attachment (sold separately)
  • Large enough for 137 cans
name: Igloo EcoCool Latitude 90QT Roller Cooler
